Subject: Client Interface issue
Description: Clicking on Transparent client type automatically disables Sound drivers, bluetooth drivers and webcam drivers. Image attached for reference.
What_We_Know__c:
02.05
- Transparent client type automatically disables Sound drivers, bluetooth drivers and webcam drivers
- asked for further details

05.05.
- the issue disappears after reverting to Normal mode
- sent them a new client and asked them to test

07.05
- the issue reproduces with the new client as well
- asked for a remote session to gather logs and make a recording

13.05
- gathered logs and a short recording
- we testeed with 6.2.5.1002, but the issue was present in 6.2.4.2 as well

14.05
- opened an ADO for the issue to be checked

26.05
- I received a test build from R&D after they replicated the issue
- I forwarded the build to the customer and asked for feedback

29.05
- asked for an update on their testing of the test build

30.05
- the customer provided the following feedback: webcam is blocked and sound drives are not disabled anymore
- asked them about bluetooth devices, since those should not be blocked

03.06
- The test build fixed the issues, BT and audio work correctly now, only other device types are getting blocked
- the customer asked in the call to close this case
Next_Steps__c:
02.05
- waiting on the customer

13.05
- waiting on the customer to send us the logs

14.05
- waiting on R&D

26.05
- waiting on the customer's feedback
Solution_Comment__c: The test build fixed the issues, BT and audio work correctly now, only other device types are getting blocked - as they should be
